item.title: Sindy, the Singing Movie Star? A2R2 Productions Acquires Film Rights to Beloved British Doll
item.description: It’s early days on the project as A2R2 is on the hunt for a “visionary female director” to breathe life into Sindy’s story, which the company is eyeing as “a funny, fierce and emotionally honest fairy
